source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest, featuring tall trees with green foliage and a forest floor covered in moss and fallen logs. As the camera moves forward, more details of the forest become visible, including a path winding through the trees and scattered rocks. The sunlight filters through the canopy, casting dappled shadows on the ground. The camera continues to move forward, revealing more of the forest's natural beauty, including a large moss-covered rock and additional fallen logs. The path becomes more visible, leading deeper into the forest. The camera's movement is smooth and steady, providing a continuous view of the serene and lush forest environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins with a view of a dense forest, featuring tall trees with green foliage and a forest floor covered in moss and fallen logs. As the camera moves forward, more details of the forest become visible, including a path winding through the trees and scattered rocks. The path becomes more visible, leading deeper into the forest. The camera's movement is smooth and steady, providing a continuous view of the serene and lush forest environment.

bad_caption: The video opens with a wide shot of a bustling city street, where cars drive past tall glass buildings and pedestrians cross at a busy intersection. As the camera pans to the right, a street performer juggles flaming torches while a crowd gathers to watch. The camera moves closer, capturing a cyclist weaving through traffic and a food vendor handing out hot dogs to customers. The camera continues to track along the sidewalk, revealing a group of skateboarders performing tricks near a fountain. The movement remains steady, providing a continuous view of the energetic urban scene as people go about their day.
